name: TranscribeAI
author: Ninh Tran <ninhtran@umn.edu>
description: TranscribeAI - A desktop application for image and audio transcription using AI

scripts.build:python: pyinstaller --onefile --distpath python/dist --workpath python/build --specpath python/build python/preprocess_to_png.py && pyinstaller --onefile --distpath python/dist --workpath python/build --specpath python/build python/image_transcribe.py && pyinstaller --onefile --distpath python/dist --workpath python/build --specpath python/build --add-binary "$(python3 -c 'from imageio_ffmpeg import get_ffmpeg_exe; print(get_ffmpeg_exe())')":. python/audio_transcribe.py && pyinstaller --onefile --distpath python/dist --workpath python/build --specpath python/build python/transcript_quality_check.py
scripts.dev:electron: npm run transpile:electron && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.dist:mac: npm run build:python && npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --mac --arm64
scripts.dist:win: npm run build:python && npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --win --x64
scripts.dist:linux: npm run build:python && npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --linux --x64
